Title: Relates to the personal income tax rates for New York residents with New York taxable income over $1,000,000
Summary: Relates to the personal income tax rates for New York residents with New York taxable income over $1,000,000 and directs revenue generated from such tax to be deposited to the credit of the New York City Housing Authority and to the division of housing and community renewal.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to personal income tax rates and in relation to directing revenue generated from certain taxes to be deposited to the credit of the New York city housing authority and the division of housing and community renewal
